Results Compared with ECoG monitoring, the lateralization rate of interictal SPECT was 94.74 %, and location rate 56.14 %.
结果　SPECT与ECoG监测进行对比, 发作间期SPECT对致痫灶的定侧率为94.74%, 定位率为56.14%.
Methods: Gated SPECT ( G - SPECT ) and rest equilibrium radionuclide angiocardiography ( ERNA ) were performed on 42 normal cases within 1 w.
方法: 42例正常人,在行门控心肌断层显像 ( G - SPECT ) 后1周内行平衡法核素心室造影 ( ERNA).
CAG data were compared with EET, SPECT and DSE.
将CAG结果分别与EET 、 SPECT和DSE结果进行对比分析.
Methods 99 m SPECT was performed in 140 newborns with perinatal asphyxia.
方法对140例有围产期窒息的新生儿进行单光子发射型计算机断层(SPECT)脑显像.
It has the advantages of high sensitivity and fast scanning over the conventional SPECT.
与传统的SPECT成像方法比较,它具有高的灵敏度和数据获取速度快的特点.
